content.rendered:
BIT assists when students, faculty or staff have behavior that may be disruptive, harmful or pose a direct threat to themselves or to the health and safety of the university community. BIT works with campus and community resources to conduct assessments, recommend interventions, and support those involved/impacted.

If you are concerned for a students’ well-being,  please complete the SOS Referral.

 

Behavioral Intervention Team Members

Director, Accessibility & SOS Services		 (909) 448-4520 amontero-camacho@laverne.edu
Juan Regalado
Associate VP for Student Affairs & Dean of Students		 (909) 448-4448 jregalado@laverne.edu
Rosemary Tilmon-Kellum
Director, Student Health Services and Lead Physician		 (909) 448-4619 rtilmon-kellum@laverne.edu
